attributes.action: Withdraw the UK and UK funding from Eurovision until other countries stop political voting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ok so the last few years our entries haven't been great but this year we did not deserve to come joint 22 with France. The UK entry, Scooch, was far better than Georgia, Armenia and even Serbia who won the competition. Political voting is spoiling what is otherwise a great competition. We want to withdraw the UK and UK funding from Eurovision to show our frustration with political voting.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
